thread.title: 13 Peach Emoji Colored Hair Looks You Need to See
thread.title_full: 13 Peach Emoji Colored Hair Looks You Need to See

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 13 Peach Emoji Colored Hair Looks You Need to See
text:
While the peach emoji is often overlooked beyond butt-related captions and comments‚Äîit's never cracked the top 100 ‚Äîpeach is having a moment on Instagram thanks to this season's surprise hit hair color.
Popularized by Kylie Jenner, who wore a peach wig by Tokyo Stylez at Coachella, stone-fruit season is officially applicable to hair color. The newest peach emoji convert? Georgia Jagger, who debuted the fruity shade by Bleach London founder Alex Brownsell late last year.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Orange hair is strangely flattering, and best of all, with hair the color of an emoji, you never have to ask "What's the caption?" again.
